channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WV

item.title: Report X-2024040738
item.description:
Report X-2024040738

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-22T15:11:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-16
  • City: CHARLESTON
  • State: WV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ON April 16th a package that contained urine and was marked as UN3373 Biological Substance, category B, 6.2 was discovered during the morning sort as leaking. The spill was contained and the package was placed into a salvage drum.
